title: SKIN79 Hot Pink Super Plus Beblesh Balm 40g
description:
Our light-weight BB Cream is readily absorbed by the skin to hydrate and impart a healthy-looking, fresh, and natural looking hint of colour. With added sunscreen, the formula affords protection from the sun's UV rays SPF25/PA++, while it also promotes whitening, wrinkle care, and sebum control effects. 

An One-Step Solution for Multiple Concerns.

Whitening and Wrinkle improvement All day: non stop skin care BB cream that controls the root of skin to turn dark and dull skin into clear skin and anti-wrinkle function makes younger looking skin.

10-in-1 One Step Solution: Whitening + Wrinkle Improvement + Control Sebum + Moisturizing  + UV Protection - Make-up Finisher with one BB in y our busy schedule.

Skinny Fit Base Make-Up: Goes on skin very thin with hold to provide clear and natural tone.

UV Protection for the skin: UV Protection (SPF 25/PA++) Prevents UV A and UV B both at the same time everyday. 

Light like a feather: keeps clean oil less skin by controlling sebum.

title: 2 NYX Jumbo Eye Pencil - Set (604,601)Milk,Black Bean
description:
Jumbo eye pencils could be used for lining as well as shadows. Containing mineral oils and powders, 
the pencils does not dry out your eyes and applies smoothly without pulling or tugging.
